WHERE staff_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_value},'%') OR staff_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_value},'%') OR staff_tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_value},'%') OR staff_email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_value},'%') OR staff_grade LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_value},'%')
WHERE staff_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value},'%')
WHERE staff_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_value}, '%')
WHERE staff_tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_value},'%')
WHERE staff_email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_value},'%')
WHERE staff_grade LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_value},'%')
) s ORDER BY sno LIMIT #{pagenum}, #{contentnum};
